name: FreeCell Pro
description:
FreeCell Solitaire by Dinobyte Studios is a classic Solitaire game for your Android device. Our version of this all time classic has been lovingly crafted to bring you the very best experience.

Our unique and original ghost card movement system lets you move columns of cards with ease. Once you have tried it, we think you won't want to play any other way!

★★★★★ GAME FEATURES ★★★★★

♠ No ads!
♠ High definition graphics
♠ Standard Microsoft FreeCell compatible game numbers (#)
♠ Highly customisable interface, with support for both landscape and portrait orientations
♠ Tap to move, or drag and drop to move a card
♠ Move whole columns of cards with ease with our unique ghost card movement system (drag just the bottom card to move the whole column where allowed)
♠ Animated Power Moves
♠ Timed games
♠ Move counter
♠ Cool card designs, with unique light and dark themes
♠ Fully customizable background color
♠ Choose between 1, 2, 3 or 4 (standard) free cells to make deals harder
♠ Useful hints
♠ Infinite undo and redo
♠ Game statistics
♠ Auto move
♠ Auto save and continue
♠ Winning animations

★★★★★ GET IN TOUCH ★★★★★

You can help to make FreeCell even better by reporting any issues to our 5★ support team at support@dinobytestudios.com who will be happy to help.

Please also rate FreeCell on Google Play; your feedback is really important to us!

You can also follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/dinobytestudios where we will be posting updates and details of what we're currently working on.

Thanks for your support!

♥ FreeCell ♥
